Mitigation.Textual:
Add the following extensions to make the configuration compliant:{add}
Remove the following extensions to make the configuration compliant:{remove}

server_name_config.Apache: Server Name: add the directive SSLServerName your_server_name to your virtualhosts;
server_name_config.nginx: Server Name: add the directive server_name your_server_name to your virtualhosts;

#ConfigurationInstructions.max_fragment_length: - the max_fragment_length extension {action} with level {level} according to guideline {guideline}
#ConfigurationInstructions.client_certificate_url: - the client_certificate_url extension {action} with level {level} according to guideline {guideline}
